DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate heat , humidify , high-flow nasal cannula ( HHHFNC ) superior hypertonic saline solution ( HSS ) treatment moderate acute viral bronchiolitis infant improve respiratory distress comfort reduce length hospital stay ( LOS ) admission Pediatric Intensive Care Unit ( PICU ) .
DOC.brief_title: High Flow Therapy v Hypertonic Saline Bronchiolitis
DOC.criteria: Children age 6 month less Moderate ( Respiratory Distress Assessment Instrument score 4 great ) viral bronchiolitis ( defined McConnockie ) Meeting Admission criterion History prematurity Chronic lung disease Cystic fibrosis Congenital heart disease Neuromuscular disease Airway anomalies Immunodeficiency Those require immediate intubation ventilation .
